typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesSystemId as integer,
		SalesPerson as string,
		SalesAmount as decimal(10,2),
		ProductName as string,
		ProductId as integer,
		CustomerId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLDataSource
SQLDataSource sink(input(
		SalesSystemId as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		SalesAmount as string,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductId as string,
		CustomerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 10,
		ProductId
	)) ~> PartitionedDataSet
